li: Identify all functions that accept object references as parameters. Make a spreadsheet of all functions that accept object references as parameters. Most functions in your application will probably be in that spreadsheet and that is okay.

Verify that object references that are passed as parameters are validated. Examine each function that accepts object references as parameters. Verify that each object reference is checked for null before being used as an object. If a function is passed null as a parameter instead of an object, the function should either throw an exception or simply not use that parameter as an object.

Identify all functions that accept object references as parameters. Make a spreadsheet of all functions that accept object references as parameters. Most functions in your application will probably be in that spreadsheet and that is okay.

Update all functions that accept object references as parameters to check parameters for null. At the beginning of each function that accepts object references, add code to check each reference for null. If a function is passed null as a parameter instead of an object, the function should either throw an exception or simply not use that parameter as an object.
p: Verify that object references that are passed as parameters to functions are checked for null before being used.
Check function parameters for null before using them to prevent your application from crashing if it tries to use that parameter as an object.
To verify that object references that are passed as parameters to functions are checked for null before being used:
To check function parameters for null before using them:

Verify that object references that are passed as parameters are validated.
Identify all functions that accept object references as parameters.
Update all functions that accept object references as parameters to check parameters for null.

html:
Applies To

  • Java

What to Check For

Verify that object references that are passed as parameters to functions are checked for null before being used.

Why

Check function parameters for null before using them to prevent your application from crashing if it tries to use that parameter as an object.

How to Check

To verify that object references that are passed as parameters to functions are checked for null before being used:

  1. Identify all functions that accept object references as parameters. Make a spreadsheet of all functions that accept object references as parameters. Most functions in your application will probably be in that spreadsheet and that is okay.
  2. Verify that object references that are passed as parameters are validated. Examine each function that accepts object references as parameters. Verify that each object reference is checked for null before being used as an object. If a function is passed null as a parameter instead of an object, the function should either throw an exception or simply not use that parameter as an object.

How to Fix

To check function parameters for null before using them:

  1. Identify all functions that accept object references as parameters. Make a spreadsheet of all functions that accept object references as parameters. Most functions in your application will probably be in that spreadsheet and that is okay.
  2. Update all functions that accept object references as parameters to check parameters for null. At the beginning of each function that accepts object references, add code to check each reference for null. If a function is passed null as a parameter instead of an object, the function should either throw an exception or simply not use that parameter as an object.
